text: I would like to report an incident on the marketplace. Two customers bought a HubSpot email template on the marketplace and they did not receive the template on their account. After checking their account I can confirm that they have not received anything and that it is reported as not purchased. I have received the payment via PayPal. If you can solve the problem to avoid the inconvenience caused to HubSpot customers. Thank you in advance.
I have the same issue as above with a module purchased in the old marketplace.
